message.name: ERR_FV_NO_PROGRAMS_SELECTED
message.locale: A check box must be selected. Please select an individual program or a combination of individual programs.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SIMULATED_DETERMINATION_AUTHORIZED
message.locale: This program recommendation result has been authorized.

message.name: ERR_XRV_SIMULATED_DETERMINATION_DECLINED
message.locale: This program recommendation result has been declined.

message.name: ERR_ELIGIBILITY_CHECK_ALREADY_IN_PROGRESS
message.locale: There is an eligibility check already in progress.

message.name: INF_EIGIBILITY_CHECK_ERROR
message.locale: An error occurred during the eligibility check. Please contact your administrator.
